r.id, r.content, r.post_id, r.user_id, r.floor, r.reply_user_id, r.status, r.create_time, r.update_time, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar, ru.username as reply_username, ru.nickname as reply_nickname, ru.avatar as reply_avatar
mapper.select: select from reply r left join user u on r.user_id = u.id left join user ru on r.reply_user_id = ru.id where r.id = #{id} and r.status = 1
select from reply r left join user u on r.user_id = u.id left join user ru on r.reply_user_id = ru.id where r.post_id = #{postId} and r.status = 1 order by r.floor asc limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select from reply r left join user u on r.user_id = u.id left join user ru on r.reply_user_id = ru.id where r.user_id = #{userId} and r.status = 1 order by r.create_time desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select count(*) from reply where post_id = #{postId} and status = 1
select count(*) from reply where user_id = #{userId} and status = 1
select coalesce(max(floor), 0) from reply where post_id = #{postId}
mapper.insert: insert into reply (content, post_id, user_id, floor, reply_user_id, status) values (#{content}, #{postId}, #{userId}, #{floor}, #{replyUserId}, #{status})
